attributes.action: Get emmerdale to scrap the dog theft story line & make a public apology
attributes.additional_details:
This is a horrendous thing to air and promote ,

Dog theft is at an all time high in the UK , and will no doubt go up even further when the idea is put into more people's minds by airing it on one of the largest soaps in the UK !

Emmerdale should scrap the storyline and make a public apology and a donation to a dog charity aimed at helping reunite dogs with their owners such as murphy's army
attributes.background: Emmerdale are currently airing a story line where Ross is stealing people's dogs for the ransom.

rejection.details:
You could contact ITV directly about this:

http://www.itv.com/viewerservices
